name: I too can grow
description:
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

INSTRUCTIONS:  Navigate using the BUTTONS in the top bar.

You wake up one morning. 

“Just a little more. I don’t want today to begin.”

🍃

For the last couple of months your life has made barely any sense. Come ... Let's sit together on this fine morning. We don't even need to talk. I'm just happy you're here.

🍃

FEATURING:

🌼 short 10 min gameplay
🌻 Interactive Twine layout
🌷 Pixel Art
🌹 1k words
🍀 Emotional baggage

Consider supporting my work on Ko-fi.
